quote.summary: Victory Securities (Holdings) Co Ltd is an investment holding company principally engaged in the provision of securities and futures brokerage services. The Company operates its business through six segments. The Securities Futures Broking Services segment is engaged in the provision of broking services in securities and futures as well as the provision of equity and debt securities placing and underwriting services to listed clients. The Financing Services segment is engaged in the provision of financing services to margin and cash clients. The Asset Management Services segment is engaged in the provision of fund management and wealth management services. The Insurance Consultancy Services segment is engaged in the provision of insurance consultancy services. The Financial Advisory Services segment is engaged in the provision of financial advisory services. The Virtual Asset Service segment is engaged in the provision of virtual assets dealing and related services.
